attributes.action: make sentencing tougher to make the crook think twice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like to start a petition to try and get prison sentences increased.
my reasoning for this is to make the criminal think twice before he commits his crime.
for murder, life to mean life
for robbery at least 20 years.
for assault with a knife at least 10 years.
in a word, all punishment for crimes to be increased.
this hopefully would send out a message to all who want to commit crime,do so at their pearl

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
